I couldn't even get the game to start to install.
I clicked on the icon and it looked as if it would start to load them nothing.
I had an issue with this game from another TPB source and am now wondering if the issue is with the game itself.
this is what i get so couldn't even start the install "This program requires a security key. If you have one, select OK to enter it. After entering a valid key, you will not be prompted again."

game doesn't need password works fine for many other here is a solution that may work for you

http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-vista/Change-Data-Execution-Prevention-settings 

if doesn't help i will reupload game with crack in separate folder to see if that helps

Can't get it to open!  It unzips easily enough, but the application file is a dud.  I've downloaded hundreds of games, here and elsewhere, and this has never happened to me before.  Please look into this.  I've never had a problem with your games before...don't know what's different about this one.
same problems with both game torrents as bumblee, this is to difficult for me.
